description: Detects suspicious renamed SysInternals DebugView execution Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Renamed SysInternals Debug View
query: (Product:("Sysinternals\ DebugView" OR "Sysinternals\ Debugview") AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Dbgview.exe" AND process.executable:*\\Dbgview.exe)))
